slurmtools: An R package for easily submitting NONMEM jobs to slurm.

slurmtools.Rd

This package aims to ease the submission and monitoring of NONMEM jobs running on slurm.

submitting jobs

  • submit_slurm_job: Submits a job to slurm

  • generate_nmm_config: Generates a NONMEMmonitor config file

monitoring jobs

  • get_slurm_jobs: Gives a table of submitted jobs to slurm that shows status and other information given with squeue

cancelling jobs

  • cancel_slurm_job: Cancels the specified job

slurm partitions

  • get_slurm_partitions: Gives a vector of available partitions a user can submit jobs to.
